Temp-compensated, dual rate; recharges within 48 h

Table 5 — Transponder Type.description: Basic Transponder; bay equipment with PDI; includes 4100-0620 Basic Transponder Interface Module in Block A
Local Mode Transponder; bay equipment with PDI; includes 4100-0625 Local Mode Transponder Interface Module in Block A

Table 6 — ES Power Supplies.includes: Aux Relay; 2 A Aux Tap/Simple NAC; 110 Ah Charger; 2 PDI blocks
Same as ES-PS except NO charger

Table 7 — Power Supply Accessories.description: 8 VDC Converter for multiple Physical Bridge Modules, 3 A max
Voltage Regulator Module, 22.8–26.4 VDC (25 V nominal); isolated/resettable; earth detect + trouble relay
Table 7 — Power Supply Accessories.current: 3 A max with 2.5 A load; 4.9 A max with 4 A load

Table 7 — Power Supply Accessories.description: ES-PS Fan Module; allows multiple PS per bay; may increase capacity (see Table 1)
Box Interconnection Harness Kit (non-audio) — one per close-nippled cabinet
Harness for ES-PS Backup Power Supply
PDM Harness for 120/220/230/240 VAC — one per PS

Table 9 — Dual Class A Isolator for IDNA.description: Dual Class A IDNAC Isolator (DCAI): converts one Class B IDNAC SLC to two Class A SLC outputs; short-circuit isolation; up to 2 per SLC (max 6 per SLC). Each isolated loop uses one IDNAC address; up to 30 device addresses per isolated loop.

Table 10 — Addressable Interface Modules.description: IDNet 2 Module, 250-point; isolated; two Class B/A outputs; 1 block
IDNet 2+2 Module, 250-point; isolated; four Class B/A outputs; 1 block
IDNet Short Circuit Isolating Loop Output Module; field add-on; up to two on a 4100-3109 module
MAPNET II Isolator Module; converts one SLC to four isolated outputs (Class A/B); 1 Slot; compatible with MAPNET II Remote Isolators only

Table 11 — Current draw for each IDNet d.note: Max 20 device LEDs on per channel

Table 12 — 8-Point Zone/Relay Card.description: 25 V regulator harness for 8-point zone/relay module

Table 14 — Communication Modules.description: Remote Unit Interface Module (RUI, unisolated); up to 3 per control panel; for use with 4100-9600 only
Alarm Relay, three Form C (2 A @ 32 VDC); ES-PS only (non power-limited)
Master Clock Interface (with RS-232) — see S4100-0033

Table 15 — Miscellaneous Options and Acc.description: 24-Point I/O Module (switch input: maintained/momentary; or output for lamp/LED/relay); 1 Slot
Terminal Block Utility Module; two 16-position terminal blocks; up to 12 AWG (3.31 mm²)
Door Tamper Switch; connects to Transponder Interface Module
120 VAC Power Distribution Module (PDM) — one per box
220/230/240 VAC Power Distribution Module (PDM) — one per box
Series resistor for WSO/IDC (470 Ω, 1 W), encapsulated; two 18 AWG leads

Table 16 — Audio Riser Modules.description: Dual Channel Analog Audio Riser Module; accepts one or two audio signals; mounts in Block B; controlled by Transponder Interface Module
3–8 Channel Digital Audio Riser Module; decodes digital input with up to eight audio channels; with NAA input
